title: PisshitteR - Grundle Punch (2006)
description:
""PISSHITER - "Grundle punch"
This is a putrid vile mix of gore grind in best traditions of CBT and Rompeprop together with some black metal influences. You read it right! Black fvkking metal!! Don&#039;t ask me to compare Pisshitter&#039;s music to some black metal bands for the reason that I&#039;ve never heard more than 5 minutes of Black Metal in my whole rotting existence because I pretty much think that black metal is too gay for me. Anyway, most of which you can hear when you listen for them thru their riffs, particularly on the &#039;chaotic&#039; part. The production is rough but still heavy and it suits the style really well. They have the rawness needed for a feeling of barbarity in the music of this kind. I&#039;m sure this will not be up everyone&#039;s alley, but I would urge you all to live a little and check these perverts out!! Well worth the listen! I am personally looking forward for the split with Funeral Rape!" -

I&#039;d like to give my personal review of PisshitteR before I do the track list:
As you can definitely tell between them and my previous uploads, they&#039;re not my cup of metal tea.  I don&#039;t necessarily dislike the grunts and guttural noises made in this type of metal, but it, personally, gets too monotonous sometimes.  If you enjoy this kind of music, fucking great, but it rubs me the wrong way.  I&#039;m putting this out to share a good (genre based) underground band.

PisshitteR

Grundle Punch - (2006)

1. Force Fed Belemic Reaction To Emetaphobic Regurgitation
2. Sexual Intercourse With Female Genitalia
3. Guntgag
4. Recitrous Spermbitch
5. Long Cold Winter Of Non Ejaculatory Functions
6. Hobbled Purple Meatfuck
7. Tukkayonukka
8. Nobody Eats White Bacon
9. Life Alterning Herpetic Sore
10.Bonus 1
11.Bonus 2
